item.name: Two Door Vanity
item.description: Oak bathroom vanity with raised panel doors and brass door handles. This cabinet can be made to fit your exact space. Perfect for the renovated bathroom with a nonstandard size of vanity, other wood types available

item.name: Large Bathroom Vanity
item.description: Custom vanity made of oak with three columns of drawers. The width of this vanity is 8 feet, it was specially built to fit the space, other designs and widths can be designed. The interior of the cupboards and drawers are birch.

item.name: Corner Cabinet
item.description: This corner bathroom cabinet has slanted front raised panel doors with maple interior and shelves.

item.name: Kitchen Cabinets
item.description: The interiors of the cabinets are made of hardwood veneer sheet goods, complete with adjustable shelves of the same quality material. Trimmed in complimentary hardwood it gives a fine finish to each cabinet interior. Finish, stains and the cabinet hardware are to the client's taste and style.

item.name: Pine Vanity
item.description: A custom made vanity of clear pine with 3 drawers for storage. It has raised panel doors and drawer fronts and dovetailed drawer boxes to complete the style.
